com.facebook.litho

Class HostComponentMountContentPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.RecyclePool
      • com.facebook.litho.DefaultMountContentPool
        • com.facebook.litho.HostComponentMountContentPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MountContentPool, PoolWithDebugInfo

    public class HostComponentMountContentPool
extends DefaultMountContentPool
    A specific pool for HostComponent. It'll hopefully go away once we integrate more consistent unmounting behavior for HostComponent into Litho.

        public void release(Object item)
        Description copied from interface: MountContentPool
        Release the given mount content into the pool.

        NB: This can be called from multiple threads, possibly at the same time!
